summary: This document is an email chain from June 30, 2020, regarding the approval of an arrest plan for Ghislaine Maxwell. It includes an attachment of the operational plan and shows coordination between FBI personnel.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The document is an email chain forwarding an approved arrest operational plan for Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Maxwell Arrest Plan Approval
events.description: An email chain shows the approval and forwarding of an arrest operational plan for Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated June 30, 2020, concerning the arrest plan for Ghislaine Maxwell.
The email includes an attachment titled '6-30-20-_GHISLAINE_MAXELL_Arrest_Oplanj003).docx', indicating a detailed operational plan.
The correspondence shows approval of the plan with hard copies to follow and a request to be notified when a specific plan is in place.
The email chain involves FBI Boston Violent Crimes, indicating law enforcement coordination for the arrest.
